Translations.Text: elif-lam-ra. tilke ayatu-lkitabi vekur'anim mubin
rubema yeveddu-llezine keferu lev kanu muslimin
zerhum ye'kulu veyetemette`u veyulhihimu-l'emelu fesevfe ya`lemun
vema ehlekna min karyetin illa veleha kitabum ma`lum
ma tesbiku min ummetin eceleha vema yeste'hirun
vekalu ya eyyuhe-llezi nuzzile `aleyhi-zzikru inneke lemecnun
lev ma te'tina bilmelaiketi in kunte mine-ssadikin
ma nunezzilu-lmelaikete illa bilhakki vema kanu izem munzarin
inna nahnu nezzelne-zzikra veinna lehu lehafizun
velekad erselna min kablike fi siye`i-l'evvelin
vema ye'tihim mir rasulin illa kanu bihi yestehziun
kezalike neslukuhu fi kulubi-lmucrimin
la yu'minune bihi vekad halet sunnetu-l'evvelin
velev fetahna `aleyhim babem mine-ssemai fezallu fihi ya`rucun
lekalu innema sukkirat ebsaruna bel nahnu kavmum meshurun
velekad ce`alna fi-ssemai burucev vezeyyennaha linnazirin
vehafiznaha min kulli seytanir racim
illa meni-steraka-ssem`a feetbe`ahu sihabum mubin
vel'arda medednaha veelkayna fiha ravasiye veembetna fiha min kulli sey'im mevzun
vece`alna lekum fiha me`ayise vemel lestum lehu birazikin
veim min sey'in illa `indena hazainuh. vema nunezziluhu illa bikaderim ma`lum
veerselne-rriyaha levakiha feenzelna mine-ssemai maen feeskaynakumuh. vema entum lehu bihazinin
veinna lenahnu nuhyi venumitu venahnu-lvarisun
velekad `alimne-lmustakdimine minkum velekad `alimne-lmuste'hirin
veinne rabbeke huve yahsuruhum. innehu hakimun `alim
velekad halakne-l'insane min salsalim min hameim mesnun
velcanne halaknahu min kablu min nari-ssemum
veiz kale rabbuke lilmelaiketi inni halikum beseram min salsalim min hameim mesnun
feiza sevveytuhu venefahtu fihi mir ruhi feka`u lehu sacidin
fesecede-lmelaiketu kulluhum ecme`un
illa iblis. eba ey yekune me`a-ssacidin
kale ya iblisu ma leke ella tekune me`a-ssacidin
kale lem ekul liescude libeserin halaktehu min salsalim min hameim mesnun
kale fahruc minha feinneke racim
veinne `aleyke-lla`nete ila yevmi-ddin
kale rabbi feenzirni ila yevmi yub`asun
kale feinneke mine-lmunzarin
ila yevmi-lvakti-lma`lum
kale rabbi bima agveyteni leuzeyyinenne lehum fi-l'ardi veleugviyennehum ecme`in
illa `ibadeke minhumu-lmuhlesin
kale haza siratun `aleyye mustekim
inne `ibadi leyse leke `aleyhim sultanun illa meni-ttebe`ake mine-lgavin
veinne cehenneme lemev`iduhum ecme`in
leha seb`atu ebvab. likulli babim minhum cuz'um maksum
inne-lmuttekine fi cennativ ve`uyun
udhuluha biselamin aminin
veneza`na ma fi sudurihim min gillin ihvanen `ala sururim mutekabilin
la yemessuhum fiha nesabuv vema hum minha bimuhracin
nebbi' `ibadi enni ene-lgafuru-rrahim
veenne `azabi huve-l`azabu-l'elim
venebbi'hum `an dayfi ibrahim
iz dehalu `aleyhi fekalu selama. kale inna minkum vecilun
kalu la tevcel inna nubessiruke bigulamin `alim
kale ebessertumuni `ala em messeniye-lkiberu febime tubessirun
kalu bessernake bilhakki fela tekum mine-lkanitin
kale vemey yaknetu mir rahmeti rabbihi ille-ddallun
kale fema hatbukum eyyuhe-lmurselun
kalu inna ursilna ila kavmim mucrimin
illa ale lut. inna lemuneccuhum ecme`in
ille-mraetehu kadderna inneha lemine-lgabirin
felemma cae ale lutini-lmurselun
kale innekum kavmum munkerun
kalu bel ci'nake bima kanu fihi yemterun
veeteynake bilhakki veinna lesadikun
feesri biehlike bikit`im mine-lleyli vettebi` edbarahum vela yeltefit minkum ehaduv vemdu haysu tu'merun
vekadayna ileyhi zalike-l'emra enne dabira haulai maktu`um musbihin
vecae ehlu-lmedineti yestebsirun
kale inne haulai dayfi fela tefdahun
vetteku-llahe vela tuhzun
kalu evelem nenheke `ani-l`alemin
kale haulai benati in kuntum fa`ilin
le`amruke innehum lefi sekratihim ya`mehun
feehazethumu-ssayhatu musrikin
fece`alna `aliyeha safileha veemtarna `aleyhim hicaratem min siccil
inne fi zalike leayatil lilmutevessimin
veinneha lebisebilim mukim
inne fi zalike leayetel lilmu'minin
vein kane ashabu-l'eyketi lezalimin
fentekamna minhum. veinnehuma lebiimamim mubin
velekad kezzebe ashabu-lhicri-lmurselin
veateynahum ayatina fekanu `anha mu`ridin
vekanu yenhitune mine-lcibali buyuten aminin
feehazethumu-ssayhatu musbihin
fema agna `anhum ma kanu yeksibun
vema halakne-ssemavati vel'arda vema beynehuma illa bilhakki. veinne-ssa`ate leatiyetun fasfehi-ssafha-lcemil
inne rabbeke huve-lhallaku-l`alim
velekad ateynake seb`am mine-lmesani velkur'ane-l`azim
la temuddenne `ayneyke ila ma metta`na bihi ezvacem minhum vela tahzen `aleyhim vahfid cenahake lilmu'minin
vekul inni ene-nneziru-lmubin
kema enzelna `ale-lmuktesimin
ellezine ce`alu-lkur'ane `idin
feverabbike lenes'elennehum ecme`in
amma kanu ya`melun
fasda` bima tu'meru vea`rid `ani-lmusrikin
inna kefeynake-lmustehziin
ellezine yec`alune me`a-llahi ilahen ahar. fesevfe ya`lemun
velekad na`lemu enneke yediku sadruke bima yekulun
fesebbih bihamdi rabbike vekum mine-ssacidin
va`bud rabbeke hatta ye'tiyeke-lyekin
eta emru-llahi fela testa`ciluh. subhanehu vete`ala `amma yusrikun
yunezzilu-lmelaikete birruhi min emrihi `ala mey yesau min `ibadihi en enziru ennehu la ilahe illa ene fettekun
haleka-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakk. te`ala `amma yusrikun
haleka-l'insane min nutfetin feiza huve hasimum mubin
vel'en`ame halekaha. lekum fiha dif'uv vemenafi`u veminha te'kulun
velekum fiha cemalun hine turihune vehine tesrahun
vetahmilu eskalekum ila beledil lem tekunu baligihi illa bisikki-l'enfus. inne rabbekum leraufur rahim
velhayle velbigale velhamira literkebuha vezineh. veyahluku ma la ta`lemun
ve`ale-llahi kasdu-ssebili veminha cair. velev sae lehedakum ecme`in
huve-llezi enzele mine-ssemai mael lekum minhu serabuv veminhu secerun fihi tusimun
yumbitu lekum bihi-zzer`a vezzeytune vennehile vel'a`nabe vemin kulli-ssemerat. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy yetefekkerun
vesehhara lekumu-lleyle vennehara vessemse velkamer. vennucumu musehharatum biemrih. inne fi zalike leayatil likavmiy ya`kilun
vema zerae lekum fi-l'ardi muhtelifen elvanuh. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy yezzekkerun
vehuve-llezi sehhara-lbahra lite'kulu minhu lahmen tariyyev vetestahricu minhu hilyeten telbesuneha. vetera-lfulke mevahira fihi velitebtegu min fadlihi vele`allekum teskurun
veelka fi-l'ardi ravasiye en temide bikum veenharav vesubulel le`allekum tehtedun
ve`alamat. vebinnecmi hum yehtedun
efemey yahluku kemel la yahluk. efela tezekkerun
vein te`uddu ni`mete-llahi la tuhsuha. inne-llahe legafurur rahim
vellahu ya`lemu ma tusirrune vema tu`linun
vellezine yed`une min duni-llahi la yahlukune sey'ev vehum yuhlekun
emvatun gayru ahya'. vema yes`urune eyyane yub`asun
ilahukum ilahuv vahid. fellezine la yu'minune bil'ahirati kulubuhum munkiratuv vehum mustekbirun
la cerame enne-llahe ya`lemu ma yusirrune vema yu`linun. innehu la yuhibbu-lmustekbirin
veiza kile lehum maza enzele rabbukum kalu esatiru-l'evvelin
liyahmilu evzarahum kamiletey yevme-lkiyameti vemin evzari-llezine yudillunehum bigayri `ilm. ela sae ma yezirun
kad mekera-llezine min kablihim feete-llahu bunyanehum mine-lkava`idi feharra `aleyhimu-ssakfu min fevkihim veetahumu-l`azabu min haysu la yes`urun
summe yevme-lkiyameti yuhzihim veyekulu eyne surakaiye-llezine kuntum tusakkune fihim. kale-llezine utu-l`ilme inne-lhizye-lyevme vessue `ale-lkafirin
ellezine teteveffahumu-lmelaiketu zalimi enfusihim. feelkavu-sseleme ma kunna na`melu min su'. bela inne-llahe `alimum bima kuntum ta`melun
fedhulu ebvabe cehenneme halidine fiha. felebi'se mesve-lmutekebbirin
vekile lillezine-ttekav maza enzele rabbukum. kalu hayra. lillezine ahsenu fi hazihi-ddunya haseneh. veledaru-l'ahirati hayr. veleni`me daru-lmuttekin
cennatu `adniy yedhuluneha tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu lehum fiha ma yesaun. kezalike yeczi-llahu-lmuttekin
ellezine teteveffahumu-lmelaiketu tayyibine yekulune selamun `aleykumu-dhulu-lcennete bima kuntum ta`melun
hel yenzurune illa en te'tiyehumu-lmelaiketu ev ye'tiye emru rabbik. kezalike fe`ale-llezine min kablihim. vema zalemehumu-llahu velakin kanu enfusehum yazlimun
feesabehum seyyietu ma `amilu vehaka bihim ma kanu bihi yestehziun
vekale-llezine esraku lev sae-llahu ma `abedna min dunihi min sey'in nahnu vela abauna vela harramna min dunihi min sey'. kezalike fe`ale-llezine min kablihim. fehel `ale-rrusuli ille-lbelagu-lmubin
velekad be`asna fi kulli ummetir rasulen eni-`budu-llahe vectenibu-ttagut. feminhum men hede-llahu veminhum men hakkat `aleyhi-ddalaleh. fesiru fi-l'ardi fenzuru keyfe kane `akibetu-lmukezzibin
in tahris `ala hudahum feinne-llahe la yehdi mey yudillu vema lehum min nasirin
veaksemu billahi cehde eymanihim la yeb`asu-llahu mey yemut. bela va`den `aleyhi hakkav velakinne eksera-nnasi la ya`lemun
liyubeyyine lehumu-llezi yahtelifune fihi veliya`leme-llezine keferu ennehum kanu kazibin
innema kavluna lisey'in iza eradnahu en nekule lehu kun feyekun
vellezine haceru fi-llahi mim ba`di ma zulimu lenubevviennehum fi-ddunya haseneh. veleecru-l'ahirati ekber. lev kanu ya`lemun
ellezine saberu ve`ala rabbihim yetevekkelun
vema erselna min kablike illa ricalen nuhi ileyhim fes'elu ehle-zzikri in kuntum la ta`lemun
bilbeyyinati vezzubur. veenzelna ileyke-zzikra litubeyyine linnasi ma nuzzile ileyhim vele`allehum yetefekkerun
efeemine-llezine mekeru-sseyyiati ey yahsife-llahu bihimu-l'arda ev ye'tiyehumu-l`azabu min haysu la yes`urun
ev ye'huzehum fi tekallubihim fema hum bimu`cizin
ev ye'huzehum `ala tehavvuf. feinne rabbekum leraufur rahim
evelem yerav ila ma haleka-llahu min sey'iy yetefeyyeu zilaluhu `ani-lyemini vessemaili succedel lillahi vehum dahirun
velillahi yescudu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ardi min dabbetiv velmelaiketu vehum la yestekbirun
yehafune rabbehum min fevkihim veyef`alune ma yu'merun
vekale-llahu la tettehizu ilaheyni-sneyn. innema huve ilahuv vahid. feiyyaye ferhebun
velehu ma fi-ssemavati vel'ardi velehu-ddinu vasiba. efegayra-llahi tettekun
vema bikum min ni`metin femine-llahi summe iza messekumu-ddurru feileyhi tec'erun
summe iza kesefe-ddurra `ankum iza ferikum minkum birabbihim yusrikun
liyekfuru bima ateynahum. fetemette`u. fesevfe ta`lemun
veyec`alune lima la ya`lemune nesibem mimma razaknahum. tellahi letus'elunne `amma kuntum tefterun
veyec`alune lillahi-lbenati subhanehu velehum ma yestehun
veiza bussira ehaduhum bil'unsa zalle vechuhu musveddev vehuve kezim
yetevara mine-lkavmi min sui ma bussira bih. eyumsikuhu `ala hunin em yedussuhu fi-tturab. ela sae ma yahkumun
lillezine la yu'minune bil'ahirati meselu-ssev'. velillahi-lmeselu-l'a`la. vehuve-l`azizu-lhakim
velev yuahizu-llahu-nnase bizulmihim ma terake `aleyha min dabbetiv velakiy yu'ehhiruhum ila ecelim musemma. feiza cae eceluhum la yeste'hirune sa`atev vela yestakdimun
veyec`alune lillahi ma yekrahune vetesifu elsinetuhumu-lkezibe enne lehumu-lhusna. la cerame enne lehumu-nnara veennehum mufratun
tellahi lekad erselna ila umemim min kablike fezeyyene lehumu-sseytanu a`malehum fehuve veliyyuhumu-lyevme velehum `azabun elim
vema enzelna `aleyke-lkitabe illa litubeyyine lehumu-llezi-htelefu fihi vehudev verahmetel likavmiy yu'minun
vellahu enzele mine-ssemai maen feahya bihi-l'arda ba`de mevtiha. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy yesme`un
veinne lekum fi-l'en`ami le`ibrah. nuskikum mimma fi butunihi mim beyni fersiv vedemil lebenen halisan saigal lissaribin
vemin semerati-nnehili vel'a`nabi tettehizune minhu sekerav verizkan hasena. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy ya`kilun
veevha rabbuke ile-nnahli eni-ttehizi mine-lcibali buyutev vemine-sseceri vemimma ya`risun
summe kuli min kulli-ssemerati fesluki subule rabbiki zulula. yahrucu mim butuniha serabum muhtelifun elvanuhu fihi sifaul linnas. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy yetefekkerun
vellahu halekakum summe yeteveffakum veminkum mey yuraddu ila erzeli-l`umuri likey la ya`leme ba`de `ilmin sey'a. inne-llahe `alimun kadir
vellahu feddale ba`dakum `ala ba`din fi-rrizk. feme-llezine fuddilu biraddi rizkihim `ala ma meleket eymanuhum fehum fihi sevaun. efebini`meti-llahi yechadun
vellahu ce`ale lekum min enfusikum ezvacev vece`ale lekum min ezvacikum benine vehafedetev verazekakum mine-ttayyibat. efebilbatili yu'minune vebini`meti-llahi hum yekfurun
veya`budune min duni-llahi ma la yemliku lehum rizkam mine-ssemavati vel'ardi sey'ev vela yesteti`un
fela tadribu lillahi-l'emsal. inne-llahe ya`lemu veentum la ta`lemun
darabe-llahu meselen `abdem memlukel la yakdiru `ala sey'iv vemer razaknahu minna rizkan hasenen fehuve yunfiku minhu sirrav vecehra. hel yestevun. elhamdu lillah. bel ekseruhum la ya`lemun

vedarabe-llahu meseler raculeyni ehaduhuma ebkemu la yakdiru `ala sey'iv vehuve kellun `ala mevlahu eynema yuveccihhu la ye'ti bihayr. hel yestevi huve vemey ye'muru bil`adli vehuve `ala siratim mustekim
velillahi gaybu-ssemavati vel'ard. vema emru-ssa`ati illa kelemhi-lbesari ev huve akrab. inne-llahe `ala kulli sey'in kadir
vellahu ahracekum mim butuni ummehatikum la ta`lemune sey'ev vece`ale lekumu-ssem`a vel'ebsara vel'ef'idete le`allekum teskurun
elem yerav ile-ttayri musehharatin fi cevvi-ssema'. ma yumsikuhunne ille-llah. inne fi zalike leayatil likavmiy yu'minun
vellahu ce`ale lekum mim buyutikum sekenev vece`ale lekum min culudi-l'en`ami buyuten testehiffuneha yevme za`nikum veyevme ikametikum vemin asvafiha veevbariha vees`ariha esasev vemeta`an ila hin

vellahu ce`ale lekum mimma haleka zilalev vece`ale lekum mine-lcibali eknanev vece`ale lekum serabile tekikumu-lharra veserabile tekikum be'sekum. kezalike yutimmu ni`metehu `aleykum le`allekum tuslimun
fein tevellev feinnema `aleyke-lbelagu-lmubin
ya`rifune ni`mete-llahi summe yunkiruneha veekseruhumu-lkafirun
veyevme neb`asu min kulli ummetin sehiden summe la yu'zenu lillezine keferu vela hum yusta`tebun
veiza rae-llezine zalemu-l`azabe fela yuhaffefu `anhum vela hum yunzarun
veiza rae-llezine esraku surakaehum kalu rabbena haulai surakaune-llezine kunna ned`u min dunik. feelkav ileyhimu-lkavle innekum lekazibun
veelkav ile-llahi yevmeizin-sseleme vedalle `anhum ma kanu yefterun
ellezine keferu vesaddu `an sebili-llahi zidnahum `azaben fevka-l`azabi bima kanu yufsidun
veyevme neb`asu fi kulli ummetin sehiden `aleyhim min enfusihim veci'na bike sehiden `ala haula'. venezzelna `aleyke-lkitabe tibyanel likulli sey'iv vehudev verahmetev vebusra lilmuslimin
inne-llahe ye'muru bil`adli vel'ihsani veitai zi-lkurba veyenha `ani-lfahsai velmunkeri velbagy. ye`izukum le`allekum tezekkerun
veevfu bi`ahdi-llahi iza `ahettum vela tenkudu-l'eymane ba`de tevkidiha vekad ce`altumu-llahe `aleykum kefila. inne-llahe ya`lemu ma tef`alun

vela tekunu kelleti nekadat gazleha mim ba`di kuvvetin enkasa. tettehizune eymanekum dehalem beynekum en tekune ummetun hiye erba min ummeh. innema yeblukumu-llahu bih. veleyubeyyinenne lekum yevme-lkiyameti ma kuntum fihi tahtelifun
velev sae-llahu lece`alekum ummetev vahidetev velakiy yudillu mey yesau veyehdi mey yesa'. veletus'elunne `amma kuntum ta`melun
vela tettehizu eymanekum dehalem beynekum fetezille kademum ba`de subutiha vetezuku-ssue bima sadettum `an sebili-llah. velekum `azabun `azim
vela testeru bi`ahdi-llahi semenen kalila. innema `inde-llahi huve hayrul lekum in kuntum ta`lemun
ma `indekum yenfedu vema `inde-llahi bak. velenecziyenne-llezine saberu ecrahum biahseni ma kanu ya`melun
men `amile saliham min zekerin ev unsa vehuve mu'minun felenuhyiyennehu hayaten tayyibeh. velenecziyennehum ecrahum biahseni ma kanu ya`melun
feiza kara'te-lkur'ane feste`iz billahi mine-sseytani-rracim
innehu leyse lehu sultanun `ale-llezine amenu ve`ala rabbihim yetevekkelun
innema sultanuhu `ale-llezine yetevellevnehu vellezine hum bihi musrikun
veiza beddelna ayetem mekane ayetiv vellahu a`lemu bima yunezzilu kalu innema ente mufter. bel ekseruhum la ya`lemun
kul nezzelehu ruhu-lkudusi mir rabbike bilhakki liyusebbite-llezine amenu vehudev vebusra lilmuslimin
velekad na`lemu ennehum yekulune innema yu`allimuhu beser. lisanu-llezi yulhidune ileyhi a`cemiyyuv vehaza lisanun `arabiyyum mubin
inne-llezine la yu'minune biayati-llahi la yehdihimu-llahu velehum `azabun elim
innema yefteri-lkezibe-llezine la yu'minune biayati-llah. veulaike humu-lkazibun
men kefera billahi mim ba`di imanihi illa men ukrihe vekalbuhu mutmeinnum bil'imani velakim men seraha bilkufri sadran fe`aleyhim gadabum mine-llah. velehum `azabun `azim
zalike biennehumu-stehabbu-lhayate-ddunya `ale-l'ahirati veenne-llahe la yehdi-lkavme-lkafirin
ulaike-llezine tabe`a-llahu `ala kulubihim vesem`ihim veebsarihim. veulaike humu-lgafilun
la cerame ennehum fi-l'ahirati humu-lhasirun
summe inne rabbeke lillezine haceru mim ba`di ma futinu summe cahedu vesaberu inne rabbeke mim ba`diha legafurur rahim
yevme te'ti kullu nefsin tucadilu `an nefsiha vetuveffa kullu nefsim ma `amilet vehum la yuzlemun
vedarabe-llahu meselen karyeten kanet aminetem mutmeinnetey ye'tiha rizkuha ragadem min kulli mekanin fekeferat bien`umi-llahi feezakahe-llahu libase-lcu`i velhavfi bima kanu yasne`un
velekad caehum rasulum minhum fekezzebuhu feehazehumu-l`azabu vehum zalimun
fekulu mimma razekakumu-llahu halalen tayyiba. veskuru ni`mete-llahi in kuntum iyyahu ta`budun
innema harrame `aleykumu-lmeytete veddeme velahme-lhinziri vema uhille ligayri-llahi bih. femeni-dturra gayra bagiv vela `adin feinne-llahe gafurur rahim
vela tekulu lima tesifu elsinetukumu-lkezibe haza halaluv vehaza haramul litefteru `ale-llahi-lkezib. inne-llezine yefterune `ale-llahi-lkezibe la yuflihun
meta`un kalil. velehum `azabun elim
ve`ale-llezine hadu harramna ma kasasna `aleyke min kabl. vema zalemnahum velakin kanu enfusehum yazlimun
summe inne rabbeke lillezine `amilu-ssue bicehaletin summe tabu mim ba`di zalike veaslehu inne rabbeke mim ba`diha legafurur rahim
inne ibrahime kane ummeten kanitel lillahi hanifa. velem yeku mine-lmusrikin
sakiral lien`umih. ictebahu vehedahu ila siratim mustekim
veateynahu fi-ddunya haseneh. veinnehu fi-l'ahirati lemine-ssalihin
summe evhayna ileyke eni-ttebi` millete ibrahime hanifa. vema kane mine-lmusrikin
innema cu`ile-ssebtu `ale-llezine-htelefu fih. veinne rabbeke leyahkumu beynehum yevme-lkiyameti fima kanu fihi yahtelifun
ud`u ila sebili rabbike bilhikmeti velmev`izati-lhaseneti vecadilhum billeti hiye ahsen. inne rabbeke huve a`lemu bimen dalle `an sebilihi vehuve a`lemu bilmuhtedin
vein `akabtum fe`akibu bimisli ma `ukibtum bih. velein sabertum lehuve hayrul lissabirin
vasbir vema sabruke illa billahi vela tahzen `aleyhim vela teku fi daykim mimma yemkurun
inne-llahe me`a-llezine-ttekav vellezine hum muhsinun
